story_parts.text: A stormtrooper in the Star Wars universe finds himself bored with his day-to-day duties. He's been itching for some excitement and decides to go on a heist adventure. He plans and execute a daring robbery of a valuable shipment. During the heist, things go awry and the stormtrooper find himself in a battle for his life. Ultimately, he escapes with his life and the loot. This adventure is just the beginning of a new life of crime for the

next_options.0: The stormtrooper makes a clean getaway and decides to retire from crime
next_options.1: The stormtrooper is captured by the authorities and thrown in prison
